author: Special Correspondent
text:
With the objective of creating awareness among higher secondary students of professional and general higher education courses and selection of engineering branches and institutions, Gandhi Institute of Technology and Management (GITAM) University, in association with The Hindu in School, will organise a career guidance programme here on February 6.

The programme will also cover management education, particularly at the undergraduate level. Students will be enlightened on the standards of higher education vis-à-vis the functional role of agencies such as the AICTE, MCI, DCI, NCI, NCTE and DEC. The event will be conducted at Mahatma CBSE School, Baba Building, Surveyor Colony, Madurai, between 10.30 a.m. and 1 p.m.
title: Career counselling tomorrow
